//| output: false

// --- Mosaic vgplot + DuckDB-WASM init (shared across paper chapters) ---
vg = {
  const mod = await import("https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@uwdata/vgplot@0.21.1/+esm");
  await mod.coordinator().databaseConnector(mod.wasmConnector());
  return mod;
}

// --- Helper: load Parquet table into DuckDB-WASM ---
async function loadTable(name, attachment) {
  const url = await attachment.url();
  await vg.coordinator().exec(vg.loadParquet(name, url));
}
